What's the average dropout rate

Good Morning

Hello Vrajesh! üëã Great to see you again!

How can I help you with Peru's 2025 education data today?

üí° You can ask me about:
  ‚Ä¢ Dropout rates by region
  ‚Ä¢ Undergraduate applicant statistics
  ‚Ä¢ Geographic visualizations
  ‚Ä¢ üîÆ **What-If Simulations** (try 'simulate menu')
  ‚Ä¢ Or type 'summary' to review our conversation.
What can you do?

ü§ñ **JGM Insights Assistant** (üìä Data Analysis)

**Data Analysis (2025):**
  ‚Ä¢ Dropout rates (primary & secondary schools)
  ‚Ä¢ Undergraduate applicant statistics
  ‚Ä¢ Regional/provincial breakdowns
  ‚Ä¢ Faculty and program analysis

**Visualizations:**
  ‚Ä¢ Interactive charts (just ask for 'chart' or 'graph')
  ‚Ä¢ Geographic maps (type 'map' or 'show map')
  ‚Ä¢ Comparative analysis

**üîÆ What-If Simulator:**
  ‚Ä¢ Predict policy impact
  ‚Ä¢ ROI calculations for investors
  ‚Ä¢ Cost-benefit analysis for NGOs
  ‚Ä¢ Try: 'simulate menu' to see options

**Commands:**
  ‚Ä¢ 'summary' - Get full conversation recap
  ‚Ä¢ 'Compare [X] and [Y]' - Compare regions
  ‚Ä¢ 'simulate [scenario]' - Run What-If analysis
  ‚Ä¢ Profile setup - Click 'üë§ Profile' button

**Example questions:**
  ‚Ä¢ What's the average dropout rate?
  ‚Ä¢ Show applicants by faculty
  ‚Ä¢ Compare Lima and Cusco dropout rates
  ‚Ä¢ What if we implement meal programs?
  ‚Ä¢ Simulate scholarship impact

What would you like to explore?
Show applicants by faculty

What if we implement meal programs

üîÆ WHAT-IF SIMULATION RESULTS
============================================================

**SCENARIO:** Universal School Meal Program
**Description:** Free breakfast and lunch for all students
**Scope:** National Average

üìä **PREDICTED OUTCOMES:**

**Immediate Impact (Year 1):**
  ‚Ä¢ Current dropout rate: 2.05%
  ‚Ä¢ Predicted rate: 1.39% 
  ‚Ä¢ Expected reduction: 0.65% (32.00% improvement)

üë• **HUMAN IMPACT:**
  ‚Ä¢ Students currently at risk: ~18,881
  ‚Ä¢ Students who would stay in school: ~6,041
  ‚Ä¢ Lives positively impacted: ~24,164 (including families)

üí∞ **FINANCIAL ANALYSIS:**

**Investment Required:**
  ‚Ä¢ Cost per student: $180/year
  ‚Ä¢ Total annual investment: $166.14M
  ‚Ä¢ 5-year commitment: $830.70M

**Economic Returns:**
  ‚Ä¢ Economic value per retained student: $35,000 (lifetime)
  ‚Ä¢ Total economic value generated: $211.44M
  ‚Ä¢ **Return on Investment (ROI): 1.27x**
  ‚Ä¢ Break-even timeline: ~7.86 years

üìà **FOR INVESTORS:**
  ‚Ä¢ Social Impact: 6,041 students
  ‚Ä¢ Financial Return: 27.26% over 10 years
  ‚Ä¢ Risk Level: Medium (education interventions)
  ‚Ä¢ Alignment: UN SDG 4 (Quality Education)

üéØ **FOR NGOs:**
  ‚Ä¢ Impact per $1,000: 0.04 students helped
  ‚Ä¢ Scalability: High (can expand to all regions)
  ‚Ä¢ Community benefit: Reduced poverty, increased literacy
  ‚Ä¢ Monitoring: Monthly dropout tracking available

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß **FOR FAMILIES:**
  ‚Ä¢ Your child's success rate increases by 32.00%
  ‚Ä¢ Better educational outcomes lead to higher income potential
  ‚Ä¢ Access to additional support services included
  ‚Ä¢ Community improvement benefits everyone

‚ö†Ô∏è **CONFIDENCE & EVIDENCE:**
  ‚Ä¢ Prediction confidence: 85%
  ‚Ä¢ Evidence base: Based on 41 meal program studies globally
  ‚Ä¢ Recommended pilot: Start with 2-3 high-risk regions

============================================================
